long_description: The comfortable, flexible fit and the excellent palm-to-finger grip of the NRS Maverick paddling gloves work together to enhance the feel of your paddle or oar. With a titanium laminate, 2mm neoprene and tough exterior coating, the NRS Maverick paddling gloves offer excellent insulation and high resistance to evaporative cooling. Glued with a low-volume liquid adhesive, the Maverick gloves retain heat better than their factory-taped counterparts-they're perfect for chilly, windy days on the water. Durable palms and curved fingers ensure excellent grip and superb control of your paddle or oar. Innovative neoprene cuffs create a comfortable seal around your forearm, reducing entry of water and retaining heat inside the gloves. To put gloves on, roll cuff back and insert hand with a twisting motion, then roll down cuff.
short_description: The comfortable, flexible fit and the excellent palm-to-finger grip of the NRS Maverick paddling gloves work together to enhance the feel of your paddle or oar.
